    "pattern": "CREATE TABLE t (a INT <constraint_type_parameter>, b INT <constraint_type_parameter>); INSERT INTO t <dml_values_parameter>; ANALYZE TABLE t; SHOW stats_meta WHERE table_name = <where_parameter>; SHOW stats_meta WHERE table_name = <where_parameter>;",
    "applied_rules": [
        "<constraint_type_parameter>",
        "<dml_values_parameter>",
        "<where_parameter>"
    ],
    "Affected Elements": "analyze table, show stats_meta",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The StatsDelta generated by the previous insert statement was not processed before the analyze-table statement, leading to inconsistent modify-count and row-count results."
